scoringCriteria.description: Fully compliant (length, spacing, margins, font, language, appendices used appropriately).
Minor deviations that do not affect readability or requirements.
Some issues (e.g., margins/length/spacing) that mildly hinder readability.
Multiple formatting problems that reduce clarity or break requirements.
Major non-compliance; formatting frequently obstructs reading.
Not compliant with required format.
All required sections present; logical flow; headings and ordering support understanding.
All major sections present; minor ordering or flow issues.
One required section weak or missing; noticeable flow issues.
Multiple sections weak or missing; organization hinders comprehension.
Poorly organized; most sections weak/missing.
Required structure largely absent.
Clear background and relevance; problem, objectives, and scope are explicit and coherent.
Mostly clear; minor gaps in objectives or scope.
Purpose stated but lacks clarity or complete scope.
Unclear motivation or objectives; scope ambiguous.
Missing key elements; hard to infer intent or scope.
No meaningful introduction or scope.
Sufficient theoretical context with accurate sources; assumptions/gaps explicitly stated.
Adequate theory and sources; small gaps or minor inaccuracies.
Some context provided; limited depth or incomplete citations.
Superficial background; weak or unclear grounding.
Minimal or inaccurate context; assumptions not stated.
No relevant background provided.
Models/equations, assumptions, tools, and approach described in replicable detail.
Mostly complete methodology; minor omissions.
Key steps present but lacks clarity or some assumptions/tools.
Incomplete or unclear methodology; assumptions not justified.
Methodology largely missing; cannot infer approach.
No methodology provided.
Complete, clear results with appropriate figures/tables/charts highlighting key outcomes.
Clear presentation; minor issues with visuals or completeness.
Results partially clear; some missing visuals or context.
Important results unclear; visuals poorly used or missing.
Sparse or confusing results.
No meaningful results presented.
Interprets results, compares to theory/literature, explains discrepancies, and notes limitations.
Sound interpretation; minor gaps in comparison or limitations.
Basic interpretation; limited comparison or discussion of limits.
Superficial analysis; little connection to theory/literature.
Minimal analysis; unsupported claims.
No discussion or analysis.
Summarizes main findings; directly addresses objectives; states significance and practical implications.
Clear conclusions with minor gaps in implications or linkage to objectives.
Conclusions present but partly generic or not fully tied to objectives.
Weak conclusions; limited connection to results or objectives.
Conclusions unclear or largely restate results without insight.
No substantive conclusions.
